text.div:
This code system http://hl7.org/fhir/conceptmap-unmapped-mode defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
use-source-code Use Provided Source CodeUse the code as provided in the $translate request in one of the following input parameters: sourceCode, sourceCoding, sourceCodeableConcept.
fixed Fixed CodeUse the code(s) explicitly provided in the group.unmapped 'code' or 'valueSet' element.
other-map Other MapUse the map identified by the canonical URL in the url element.

name: ConceptMapGroupUnmappedMode
title: Concept Map Group Unmapped Mode
description: Defines which action to take if there is no match in the group.

concept.definition: Use the code as provided in the $translate request in one of the following input parameters: sourceCode, sourceCoding, sourceCodeableConcept.
Use the code(s) explicitly provided in the group.unmapped 'code' or 'valueSet' element.
Use the map identified by the canonical URL in the url element.
